Name: Stone Fence
Ingredients: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Top up with Medium dry apple cider
Instructions: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and stir. Serve with straws.
Review: Dry cider fortified and made drier by rye whiskey.
History: Although the origin of this simple mixed drink and its name are unknown history chronicles its being served at taverns since at least the early 1800s.
Nutrition: One serving of Stone Fence contains 133 calories
